metadata.name: Kirakira Sweet Pink
metadata.description:
Open the compact anytime you want to feel sweet and happy. 

There are 3 compacts made with flower magic. They are shining with Kirakira Flower Power. To collect pink, yellow and blue, they will be shining with infinite flower power. 

Music composed by Shuta Yasukochi. Made with multiple applications such as Houdini, Redshift and Adobe. 

The owner will be able to receive MP4/MOV with full spec encoding. This is the purchase benefit only for the primary sale.
